title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3252/92 of 9 November 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3062/92 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in the Netherlands
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3252/92  of 9 November 1992  amending Regulation (EEC) No 3062/92 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in the Netherlands
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply to applications lodged from 30 October 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 129, 11. 5. 1989, p. 12. (3) OJ No L 308, 24. 10. 1992, p. 13.
ANNEX
(ECU/tonne)
CN code  Products in respect of which aid is granted  Aid for a storage period of one month  Supplement       per month  per day        ex 0203  Meat of domestic swine, fresh or chilled:     ex 0203 11 10  Half carcases without the head,  forefoot, tail, flare fat, kidney, thin skirt and spinal cord (1)  260  48  1,60  ex 0203 12 11  Legs  324  55  1,82  ex 0203 12 19  Shoulders  324  55  1,82  ex 0203 19 11  Fore-ends  324  55  1,82  ex 0203 19 13  Loins, with or without the neck-end,  or neck-ends separately, loins with or without the chump (2) (3)  324  55  1,82  ex 0203 19 15  Bellies, whole or trimmed by rectangular cut  127  42  1,40
(1) The aid may be granted for half carcases presented as Wiltshire sides, i.e.  without the head, cheek, chap, feet, tail, flare fat, kidney, tenderloin, blade bone, sternum, vertebral column, pelvic bone and diaphragm.
(2) Loins and neck-ends may be with or without rind.
(3) The quantity covered by contract may include any combination of the products mentioned.
